info.title: spamapi
info.description: Easily and directly scan and block phishing security threats.

post.summary: Perform AI spam detection and classification against input text string.  Analyzes input content as well as embedded URLs with AI deep learnign to detect spam, phishing and other unsafe content.  Uses 25-75 API calls depending on model selected.

Perform advanced AI spam detection and classification against input text string.  Analyzes input content as well as embedded URLs with AI deep learnign to detect spam, phishing and other unsafe content.  Uses 25-100 API calls depending on model selected.

InputString.description: Input text string to detect spam against

Model.description: Optional: Specify which AI model to use.  Possible choices are Normal and Advanced.  Default is Advanced.

AllowUnsolicitedSales.description: True if unsolicited sales should be allowed, false otherwise

AllowPromotionalContent.description: True if promotional content should be allowed, false otherwise

AllowPhishing.description: True if phishing should be allowed, false otherwise

SpamDetectionAdvancedResponse.description: Result of detecting spam using AI

CleanResult.description: True if the result is not spam (clean), and false otherwise

ContainsSpam.description: True if the input text contains spam, false otherwise

ContainsUnsolicitedSales.description: True if the input text contains unsolicited sales, false otherwise

ContainsPromotionalContent.description: True if the input text contains promotional content, false otherwise

ContainsPhishingAttempt.description: True if the input text contains a phishing attempt, false otherwise
